scripts.dev-copy: mkdirp dist/js dist/css && ncp src/js dist/js && ncp src/index.html dist/index.html
scripts.dev: npm run dev-copy && start npm run dev-css && npx serve dist
scripts.build: mkdirp dist/js dist/css && ncp src/js dist/js && ncp src/index.html dist/index.html && cross-env NODE_ENV=production npx tailwindcss -i ./src/css/styles.css -o ./dist/css/styles.css --minify
